subject: Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: His team lost Game 1 of the Stanley Cup finals and his No. 1 goaltender is out for the series because his knee looks like a car wreck. What, Edmonton Coach Craig MacTavish worry?
snippet: His team lost Game 1 of the Stanley Cup finals and his No. 1 goaltender is out for the series because his knee looks like a car wreck. What, Edmonton Coach Craig MacTavish worry?
